text: Zarateana is a genus of small, air-breathing land snails, terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Geomitridae, the hairy snails and their allies. The genus is endemic to the Iberian Peninsula. == Species == The genus contains two species: * Zarateana arganica (Servain, 1880) type species * Zarateana rocandioi (Ortiz de Zárate y López, 1950) == References == Category:Stylommatophora stubs Category:Stylommatophora
title: Zarateana
